marklogic.body: Objectivists who write movie reviews tend to read their own politics into movies they like. But here it really does seem to be correct that the author intends some kind of left-wing critique of the "military-industrial complex." That doesn't mean you shouldn't like the movie. But I wish more Objectivists would realize that just as they read their own politics into a movie, all the other people who like the movie are reading in their politics. knows this, so purposefully makes the movie in a way that people can read in any politics they like.Â So the interest in this movie isn't a result of some sudden upsurge of anti-statist sentiment.Â Much the same can be said, I think, of many Objectivists' reaction to Firefly and Serenity.
